Player History
Drafted in 19th round, 301st overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2015, off Charles Bodkin (COL)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cincinnati on 4/4/2015...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,207,143 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
10/3/2016: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (C), $5,750,000 per year, for 4 years.
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 9/26/2018...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Montreal on 3/2/2019 (Going to MON: 1B Donald Lamberth, LF Brett Godby. Going to STL: 3B Tyler Hazel, C John Searles)...
Injured on 5/5/2019 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2019, hitting .440 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2019, hitting .429 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
